text: Douglas William "Doug" Jarrett (April 22, 1944 - February 10, 2014) was a Canadian ice hockey player. He was a Defense in the National Hockey League (NHL) with the Chicago Black Hawks and New York Rangers. He also did work on behalf of the Chicago Blackhawk Alumni Association. He was born in London, Ontario. In 2011, he was inducted into the London (Ontario) Sports Hall of Fame. He died from lung cancer on February 10, 2014 in Fort Erie, Ontario. He was aged 69. He was diagnosed with the disease ten days before his death. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:New York Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from London, Ontario
title: Doug Jarrett
